question: The "Leizhou Peninsula" is located in which nation?
explanation: The Leizhou Peninsula is geographically related to China. It is located in the southern Guangdong province of China. It is the third-largest peninsula in China. Gulf of Tonkin lies to the west of this peninsula. It is the most southerly point of continental China. Hainan Island is located south of the Leizhou Peninsula, which is separated by Qiongzhou Strait.
